description:
This is needed for https://review.openstack.org/#/c/30028/

Currently the DB API returns all the instance groups to anyone without restricting it to the current project id context (or admin context). For example in def instance_group_get(context, group_uuid), we need to check for admin context and have a project_only flag.
title: The DB API needs to check for the right project etc.
